title: IDG Meeting Documentation UI
description:
IDG Meeting Documentation System with Form-Based Data Entry

Build a complete meeting documentation system for Interdisciplinary Group (IDG) meetings that captures attendees, discussion topics, decisions, and action items through a structured form interface.

Core Functionality:

Meeting Metadata Capture:
- Date, time, and duration fields with calendar picker
- Location (physical/virtual with meeting link support)
- Meeting type categorization (regular, emergency, planning, review)
- Meeting facilitator and note-taker identification
- Optional meeting agenda attachment or reference

Attendee Management:
- Dynamic participant list with add/remove functionality
- Capture name, role/title, department, and attendance status (present, absent, remote)
- Support for guest attendees vs regular members
- Track late arrivals and early departures with timestamps
- Email notification option for attendees upon meeting completion

Discussion Topics:
- Multi-topic entry with reorderable list
- Fields per topic: title, description, time allocated vs actual, presenter
- Support for sub-topics or nested discussion items
- Ability to mark topics as tabled/deferred to future meetings
- Link related documents or reference materials per topic

Decision Tracking:
- Structured decision entries linked to discussion topics
- Required fields: decision text, rationale, decision date
- Optional fields: voting results, dissenting opinions, implementation timeline
- Assign responsible parties (single or multiple assignees)
- Decision status tracking (proposed, approved, rejected, on hold)
- Version history for amended decisions

Action Items:
- Create action items during or after meeting
- Required: description, assignee, due date
- Optional: priority level, status, estimated effort, dependencies
- Link action items to parent decisions or topics
- Support recurring action items
- Overdue item flagging and notification

Data Persistence & Retrieval:
- Auto-save functionality every 30 seconds or on field blur
- Draft vs submitted status differentiation
- Full CRUD operations on meeting records
- Search and filter capabilities (by date, type, attendee, keyword)
- Meeting history view for tracking series or recurring meetings
- Archive functionality for completed meetings

Export & Sharing:
- Generate formatted PDF meeting minutes
- Export to Word/Google Docs format
- Email distribution to attendees with customizable template
- Calendar integration for action item deadlines
- Summary dashboard showing open action items across all meetings

Validation & Error Handling:
- Required field validation before submission (date, attendees, at least one topic)
- Format validation for dates, emails, URLs
- Duplicate meeting detection warning
- Graceful handling of network failures during auto-save
- Clear error messages with guidance for resolution

Concurrent Access Management:
- Detect when multiple users open the same meeting record
- Implement optimistic locking or real-time collaborative editing
- Show who is currently viewing/editing
- Conflict resolution strategy for simultaneous edits

User Experience:
- Responsive design supporting desktop (1920px), tablet (768px), and large mobile (480px minimum)
- Keyboard navigation and shortcuts for power users
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance
- Progress indicator for multi-section forms
- Contextual help text and tooltips for complex fields
- Unsaved changes warning before navigation away

Technical Implementation:
- Define database schema for meetings, attendees, topics, decisions, and action items with proper foreign key relationships
- Create REST or GraphQL API endpoints for all CRUD operations
- Implement authentication and authorization (view vs edit permissions)
- Set up scheduled jobs for overdue action item notifications
- Add audit logging for record modifications
- Consider offline support with local storage fallback
- Implement pagination for large meeting lists

Success Criteria:
- Users can create complete meeting record in under 10 minutes
- Zero data loss from auto-save functionality
- Export generates properly formatted, professional documentation
- All action items from meetings are trackable until completion
- System supports concurrent usage by 50+ users without performance degradation
